name: TDP5 Arena 3D
description: TDP5: Arena - the outstanding Free-To-Play 3D online shooter game with RPG elements, styled as 2D platformer. Real physics, various maps, achievement system, flexible adjustment of talents, leaderboard and much more you can find in our game! Come quickly!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or higher Processor: Pentium D / Athlon х2 or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8600 Gt / ATI Radeon HD 2600 / Intel GMA 950 (i945G) or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Yes

reviews.review_text: TDP5 Arena 3D is a side scrolling, arena, team-based FPS with a bit of potential, but way too many issues. Also, it's a browser game.  First of all, the camera is attrocious. The 'aiming' function changes the camera view to a 1st person point of view... In a pretty much 2D world... It's not pretty. The music is obnoxious and loud, the sound effects sounds like they have been imported from an old floppy disk.  There's only 1 server and it's located in Europe. Barely any players were actually playing the game at the time of writting this review. 52 players were online, in fact.  Is it fun? Yes, for a little while... But it's clunky and Pay to Win, it's got too many issues, I cannot recommend this game.
not bad!! the conrols can be better....
